title: Sir Luck and Mister Riches feat. Michael Ian Black and David Wain
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Comedian/kids' author Michael Ian Black (I'm Worried, Cock-a-Doodle-Doo-Bop) and actor/director David Wain (Wet Hot American Summer, Stella) star in this supernatural story from Spain, Portugal, Czech Republic and the Dominican Republic.
itunes:author: WBUR
